title: How to Make Cookies N Cream Brownies with Brownie Mix

steps.headline: Pre-heat the oven to the temperature stated on the brownie mix pkg.
Crumble the Oreos into a small bowl.
steps.description: The size of the pieces is up to you.

steps.headline: Combine all ingredients into a medium sized bowl.
Spray or grease a 13 x 9 inch pan.
Pour half of the brownie batter into the pan.
Sprinkle about half of the cookie crumbs into the pan; spread evenly.
Layer the rest of the brownie mix batter into the pan.
Bake for the recommended time stated on the package.
Spread the frosting on top of the brownies and then sprinkle the rest of the cookie crumbs on top of the frosting.

text: Pre-heat the oven to the temperature stated on the brownie mix pkg.  Crumble the Oreos into a small bowl. The size of the pieces is up to you. Combine all ingredients into a medium sized bowl.  Spray or grease a 13 x 9 inch pan.  Pour half of the brownie batter into the pan.  Sprinkle about half of the cookie crumbs into the pan; spread evenly.  Layer the rest of the brownie mix batter into the pan.  Bake for the recommended time stated on the package.  Let the brownies cool completely.  Spread the frosting on top of the brownies and then sprinkle the rest of the cookie crumbs on top of the frosting.  Slice into individual servings.
